title: pixel 1 Bootloop
content: my pixel 1 stuck on bootloop and i dont know whats the causes, i was just watching youtube and wanted to change different tab and all of a sudden the freeze couldn't do anything, so i try to reset it by pressing the power button and volume button. so i guess from there my phone got boot loop. is there any way to fix this? been struggling to fix this which is very frustrating.  I've be doing research on the internet to find this solution and a lot of people still struggling too. your help is greatly appreciated
